propertydef.name: name
propertydef.description: The name value of the fuel and lube type.

propertydef.name: description
propertydef.description: The description value of the fuel and lube type.

propertydef.name: category
propertydef.description: The category value of the fuel and lube type.

propertydef.name: unitType
propertydef.description: The unit type of the fuel and lube type.

propertydef.name: fieldInputUnitName
propertydef.description: The unit in which to interpret values received from the field.

propertydef.name: machineOID
propertydef.description: The machine associated with the event.

propertydef.name: odometer
propertydef.description: The equipment odometer information at the time of the event.

propertydef.name: fuelAttendantOID
propertydef.description: The fuel attendant associated with the event.

propertydef.name: operatorOID
propertydef.description: The operator associated with the event.

propertydef.name: dataSource
propertydef.description: The data source associated with the event.

propertydef.name: fluids
propertydef.description: The fuel associated with service hours event.
